channel.title: Multi spells at slayer tower problem
channel.description:
i have made 3 level slayer tower in my server, but if you attack a monster on level 2 or 3 with a multi spell it will also kill monsters on the lower levels, i tried to add the slayer tower into the single wild area to see if that would work but no luck hehe
im guessing i might have to edit my attacknpcswithin or edit all my spells to not hit multiple enemies (hope not)

item.title: Multi spells at slayer tower problem
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You could probably just make the method check what heightLevel the spell is being casted at. There is many ways to do this.

Read full topic
item.source: Multi spells at slayer tower problem
